name: Mid Cheshire College
details: This degree includes various multimedia implementations including graphic design, web design, 2D animations and fine art.

name: Staffordshire University
details: This diploma covers various aspects of game design and programming, including fundamental design, games engines and physics, and rapid prototyping.

name: Soshi Games
details: As my first role in the industry, I began as a junior developer. I used a wide range of technologies including Flash, AS3, MongoDB, Unity3D and native mobile development in Java and Obj-C.
I worked on games such as Music Festivals, hosted on Facebook Games, and Clue the Music, a range of music trivia games including working directly with Brian May of Queen.
